description: Metadata captured during ingestion of a document.

crawl_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the document was crawled or collected.
crawl_timestamp.title: Crawl Timestamp

external_ref.description: Optional external reference identifiers provided by source systems (<= 16 entries; keys <= 128 chars, values <= 512 chars; limits enforced).
external_ref.title: External Ref

language.description: Optional BCP-47 language tag representing the primary language.
language.title: Language

origin_uri.description: Original source URI for the ingested document.
origin_uri.title: Origin Uri

tags.description: Optional collection of tags for retrieval and filtering.
tags.title: Tags

tenant_id.description: Tenant identifier the metadata belongs to.
tenant_id.title: Tenant Id

workflow_id.description: Workflow identifier that groups document ingestion context.
workflow_id.title: Workflow Id

title: Document Metadata
